info.title: Frankfurter API
info.description: The Frankfurter API tracks foreign exchange references rates published by the European Central Bank.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Quote against other currencies using the from parameter

get.summary: Get historical rates for any working day since 4 January 1999

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Tweak the response using the from parameter

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Tweak the response using the to parameter

get.summary: Get a set of historical rates for a given time period
Get all dates up to the present

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Limit result to rates you are interested in

get.summary: Get a list of available currency symbols along with their full names
